query:
-- Get template items for template ID 10001 (งานวางผัง)
INSERT INTO checklistItemResults (taskChecklistId, templateItemId, result, remarks, photoUrls)
SELECT 60003, id, 'na', NULL, NULL
FROM checklistTemplateItems
WHERE templateId = 10001
ORDER BY `order`
